Setting parameter values into xml files

Source: R/set_param_xml.R
set_param_xml.Rd

Setting parameter values for a parameter or a vector of and with a parameters values vector

set_param_xml(
  xml_file,
  param_names,
  param_values,
  out_path = NULL,
  out_file = NULL,
  select = NULL,
  value = NULL,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

xml_file

an xml file path
param_names

parameter names vector (i.e.: option parameter name, parameter name, other kinds in ini and some tec parameters not taken into account for the moment)
param_values

parameter(s) values or a list of
out_path

a directory path
out_file

an xml file name
select

node name or attribute name name to use for selection (optional)
value

value used for select (optional)
overwrite

Logical TRUE for overwriting the output file, FALSE otherwise (default)
...

To pass some other arguments

Value

A logical value TRUE for operation success, FALSE otherwise

Examples


if (FALSE) {
xml_path = system.file("extdata/xml/examples/V9.1/sols.xml", package = "SticsRFiles")
file.copy(xml_path, getwd())
get_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi")

# Setting all "argi" values to 50
set_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi", 50)

get_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi")

# Setting a specific value to "argi" for "solcanne" soil
set_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi",56,
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")

get_param_xml("sols.xml", "argi",
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")


# Setting a specific values to 2 parameters "argi" and "norg" for "solcanne" soil
set_param_xml("sols.xml", c("argi", "norg"),list(100,150),
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")

get_param_xml("sols.xml", c("argi", "norg"),
select = "sol", value = "solcanne")

}
